title: We Are Pet Friendly!
posting_body: ['Limited Availability!', 'An Affordable yet Contemporary Lifestyle.', 'Kendallwood Apartment Homes is perfectly located close to everything a resident needs.', "Located in the City of East Whittier, Kendallwood is just a short stroll to schools, the library, the Whittwood Town Center, which includes a Target, PetSmart, JCPenney's, Sears, Old Navy, Kohl's, Vons, 24 Hour Fitness and the United States Postal Service.", 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 37', 'OR Text', '37', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Follow The Link', 'Below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1,015 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Dishwasher', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Large Patios & Balconies Available', '- Gas Stove', '- Central Air Conditioning & Heat', '- Carport', '- Refrigerator', '- Extra Storage', '- Washer & Dryer', 'In Home', '- Pantry', '- Cable and Internet Ready (Spectrum and Frontier FiOS)', '- Pet Friendly', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Microwave*', 'Community Amenities', '- Amazon Hub', '- Covered Parking', '- Spa/Hot Tub', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Fitness Center', '- Across street from the Whittwood Town Center and East Whittier Library', '- Sparkling Swimming Pool', '- Laundry Room', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs(most) or Cats: $500 pet deposit- $50 pet rent per month.', '*Restrictions apply', 'Driving Directions', 'From the 5 or 91 Freeway, exit Beach Blvd.', 'Turn left on Imperial Hwy.', 'and right on Santa Gertrudes Avenue.', 'We are on the right just past Lambert.', 'Office Hours', 'Mon to Fri 9:00 am to 6:00 pm', 'Sat 9:00 am to 6:00 pm', 'Sun Closed', 'Kendallwood', '10522 Santa Gertrudes Avenue, Whittier, CA, 90603', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'Y5PuDmV0y']
